p: The fourth session took place in the municipality of Icod de los Vinos, which has a more rural character. Its population is almost 23,000 inhabitants ( ISTAC, 2017a). The same procedure was used to invite local citizens. 10 people attended the event and actively participated in the debate. The main feature of this last session was that, with some exceptions, most of the people were not experts. This smaller number of participants allowed more thoroughly exploration of concrete measures to adapt to the heat, Saharan dust events and air pollution.
